original_text: Groups of soldiers from Syria had gone to attack places in Israel. They had caught a young girl as their prisoner. She became a servant of Naaman's wife. Kings 4 Kings 6
korean_text: 전에 아람 사람이 떼를 지어 나가서 이스라엘 땅에서 어린 소녀 하나를 사로잡으매 그가 나아만의 아내에게 수종들더니

sentences.original_text: Groups of soldiers from Syria had gone to attack places in Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 시리아 군대들이 이스라엘의 여러 장소를 공격하러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had caught a young girl as their prisoner.
She became a servant of Naaman's wife.
